channel.title: 508 Where i put cache?
channel.description:
Please do not try to help me if you have not been able to run a 508 server and client yourself.
Well this is what i did: 1.downloaded the 508 server, client, and cache then extracted into the C disk 2.renamed cache to "508 Cache", it was originally "rs2" 3.Put the cache in the "files" folder of the client. 4.i pressed build.cmd in the client folder. 5.after compiled, i ran the 508 server. 6.Then i ran the 508 client by clicking on run.cmd in client folder 7.I get this error: [code] Error: SignLink:233 SignLink: 372 Applet_sub1:338 client:2196 | java.lang.RuntimeException [/code]
I have been told this is because i have misplaced the 508 cache but ive tried different tuts to get it working. I tryd putting the original 508 cache called "rs2" into a new folder called "508 cache" and just leaving that in C drive. I tried putting the C:508 Cache/rs2 into the "files" folder in client. Ive tried many things but i still get the same error.
If somebody could help it would be highly appreciated.

item.title: 508 Where i put cache?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51

@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“russian b, post:4, topic:236462”]Great, thanks but now i get the error_game_js5connect error. How i fix that?[/quote]The server has to be running first.

item.title: 508 Where i put cache?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Go to start menu -> My Computer -> Local Disk © -> Make a new folder called: cache508
And put your cache that you have in that folder.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Where i put cache?
item.dc:creator: @russian_b russian b
item.description:
@russian_b wrote:

Please do not try to help me if you have not been able to run a 508 server and client yourself.

Well this is what i did:
1.downloaded the 508 server, client, and cache then extracted into the C disk
2.renamed cache to “508 Cache”, it was originally “rs2”
3.Put the cache in the “files” folder of the client.
4.i pressed build.cmd in the client folder.
5.after compiled, i ran the 508 server.
6.Then i ran the 508 client by clicking on run.cmd in client folder
7.I get this error:

Error: SignLink:233 SignLink: 372 Applet_sub1:338 client:2196 | java.lang.RuntimeException

I have been told this is because i have misplaced the 508 cache but ive tried different tuts to get it working. I tryd putting the original 508 cache called “rs2” into a new folder called “508 cache” and just leaving that in C drive. I tried putting the C:508 Cache/rs2 into the “files” folder in client. Ive tried many things but i still get the same error.

If somebody could help it would be highly appreciated.

Read full topic
